comprehensive_overview: R-cellchat is an R package designed for the analysis of single-cell RNA sequencing data to identify cell-cell communication networks.
core_features: The software enables users to characterize ligand-receptor interactions, infer cell-cell communication networks, and visualize the results in an interactive and interpretable manner. It provides modules for preprocessing scRNA-seq data, identifying differentially expressed genes, and predicting ligand-receptor pairs.
